name: Engineering
description: Technical documentation, architecture designs, API specifications, database schemas, infrastructure guides, and development best practices. Home for all engineering-related knowledge including code patterns, deployment procedures, and system designs.

name: Product
description: Product requirements documents, feature specifications, roadmaps, user research findings, design mockups, and product strategy. Contains product development lifecycle documentation from ideation to launch.

name: Marketing
description: Marketing campaigns, go-to-market strategies, brand guidelines, content calendars, promotional materials, social media plans, and customer-facing messaging. All marketing-related collateral and planning documents.

name: Customer Success
description: Customer onboarding guides, support documentation, troubleshooting playbooks, help articles, training materials, and customer communication templates. Resources for ensuring customer satisfaction and success.

name: Sales
description: Sales playbooks, pitch decks, proposal templates, pricing guides, competitive analysis, customer case studies, and deal workflows. Sales enablement materials and best practices for closing deals.

name: Operations
description: Internal processes, operational procedures, compliance documentation, vendor management, budget planning, team policies, and administrative workflows. Day-to-day operational knowledge and procedures.

name: Design
description: Design systems, UI/UX guidelines, component libraries, brand assets, design principles, user research, wireframes, and prototypes. Visual and interaction design documentation.

name: People & Culture
description: HR policies, employee handbook, onboarding procedures, performance review templates, company values, team building activities, and benefits information. Human resources and culture documentation.

name: Finance
description: Financial planning, budgets, expense policies, invoice templates, procurement procedures, financial reports, and audit documentation. Finance and accounting resources.

name: Legal
description: Legal contracts, terms of service, privacy policies, compliance requirements, intellectual property documentation, and legal guidelines. Legal department resources and templates.

name: Security
description: Security policies, incident response procedures, vulnerability reports, penetration testing results, security audit findings, and compliance certifications. Information security documentation.

name: Data & Analytics
description: Data models, analytics dashboards, reporting guidelines, data pipeline documentation, metrics definitions, and business intelligence resources. Data team documentation and best practices.

name: Inbox
description: Temporary holding area for new documents that haven't been organized yet. Documents here should be reviewed and moved to appropriate collections.

name: Archive
description: Deprecated and historical documents no longer actively used but kept for reference. Old project documentation, outdated processes, and legacy materials.
